item.name: Home
item.description: It was one of those afternoons where I really wanted a sandwich. I took quick inventory of my fridge: bread, cheese, onions. So, I thought, “Grilled Cheese Sandwich.” But the onion looked so inviting, I thought, why not add some grilled onion to the sandwich, as well? After all, I love onions. So, you start […]
